name: Ninja vs Samurai ed:2
description: Scene 2: At top of tsuyama castle.  Ninja: I was expecting you to be a Little bit clever than this ,you don't know that this night is mine ...... No one can defeat me today ,i am Ninja of koga clan ,i can summon an okami(wolf) spirit ,not just any okami(wolf) the strongest of them all . Kazan: wow, interesting. Ninja: O great lord Kazan ryū , I am gonna defeat you today . Kazan: why do you want to defeat me so badly ? Ninja: You dare to ask that , you defeated the koga clan years ago , a single samurai defeated the entire clan ,is this a joke or something .That day you didn't killed anyone ,but left them defeated , injured and scars so deep in their soul that can never be cured. I saw my father took his own life in front my eyes. Kazan: I am sorry for your loss ,son ! But I gave them a chance to live ,I didn't killed anyone. Ninja: I will restore honor of koga clan today.  Ninja drew his sword , a bright circular ring formed around him ,and a spirit of Okami(wolf) came out of his sword , hovering over Ninja. Kazan also drew his sword just a little bit ,a bright pinkish light came out.
